alert.note: Alert for Chowan; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perquimans and southeastern Chowan Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 514 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cape Colony, or 11 miles southwest of Hertford, moving east at 20 mph. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. While a tornado is not immediately likely, remain alert for any warnings. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Snug Harbor around 540 PM EDT. Hertford around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Saint Johns, Light Nixon Fork, Drummond Point and Somerset. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects.
